description: In this course you will learn how to purchase a VPS (Virtual Private Server) to create a webserver on an Ubuntu Machine with a program called nginx. Not only will this save you money but it will give you freedom to do more with your server. I will be going over security measures for linux, mysql and more. This course will also teach you about purchasing domain names, setting up DNS servers and show you step by step on how to install an SSL (Secure Socket Layer) Certificte.
title: Setup Wordpress on nginx(webserver) + SSL FULL GUIDE!
